__e: She said she'd never kissed a grown man before... and she might as well kiss me.
But one thing I ain't never seen, man nor woman, is a grown-up.
I don't quite believe I'm going to say this to a grown man:
Shame will keep us in all kinds of prisons if we let it.
Dad, you said that when I turned 118, I could go out into the world like every other adult that gets to come and go from this hotel.
Where there are no grown-ups to tell you what to do.
I heard on the grapevine about what happened. And, well, I know how hard it is to talk to adults sometimes, even though you feel like you want to.
It is so nice to get out of the house and spend time with another grownup.
You had no use for me as a child and you can't bear the thought of me as an adult.
